source.8942f54a:
train_datagen= ImageDataGenerator( rescale=1./255,
                                  shear_range=0.2,
                                  zoom_range=0.2,
                                  horizontal_flip=True )
training_set=train_datagen.flow_from_directory('../input/skin-cancer-malignant-vs-benign/train',
                                                 target_size = (64, 64),
                                                 batch_size = 10,
                                                 class_mode = 'binary')

                                            target_size = (64, 64),
                                            batch_size = 10,
                                            class_mode = 'binary')

source.8c015577:
Hello, 
I made CNN to detect skin cancer if it "Malignant" or "benign" 
I think this dataset are too less to max the accuracy but at least, I get accuracy 93% for training and for val 83%
